page.title: 11THE FOUNTAIN GARDENS PAISLEY
page.content:
These gardens were once the property of a prominent business man Mr. John Love. He was ruined when large shipments to America proved to be a disastrous venture.
He changed the name from Hope Temple Gardens to the one of Fountain Gardens. Flowers and shrubs were laid out in them and this is maintained today. Sometimes in the summer the fountain is turned on, but this is an irregular occurrence.
During my observation this beautiful amenity was largely unused, the public merely passing by. Perhaps if more local people are made aware of the park's existence they will use it more. It would be unfortunate if this historic amenity were to be lost due to lack of use or new development.
